quotes.quote: An organisation that treats its programmers as morons will soon have programmers that are willing and able to act like morons only.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: "How to test?" is a question that cannot be answered in general. "When to test?" however, does have a general answer: as early and as often as possible.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: Design and programming are human activities; forget that and all is lost.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
